name: Instable
description:
A simple 2D-Platformer where you play as an unstable character sprite whose abilities are determined by the color it changes to. As the sprite abilities grow so does the players ability to perceive the world. Only two colors so far. Blue for jump, yellow for dash.

Small project I made for class. Made on Mac using Unity. Executable is for Windows

Music: Eric Skiff - Prolouge - Resistor Anthems - Available at http://EricSkiff.com/music
